tasks.instruction:
PHASE 1 - DATABASE SETUP (Task 1.1): Set up PostgreSQL 15+ with pgvector extension for the Routix Platform. 

DELIVERABLES REQUIRED:
- PostgreSQL 15+ installation with pgvector extension
- Execute all SQL schema from /workspace/docs/design/er_diagram.plantuml
- Database migration system (Alembic) setup
- Seed script for:
  * Admin user (email: admin@routix.com, password: secure_password)
  * Default Routix v1 algorithm
  * System settings
- Connection pooling configuration
- Read replica setup (if applicable)

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- All tables created successfully
- pgvector extension working
- Can insert and query with vector similarity
- Migrations are reversible

ARCHITECTURE CONTEXT:
Reference the complete system architecture at: /workspace/docs/design/system_architecture.md
Reference the database schema at: /workspace/docs/design/er_diagram.plantuml
Reference the project structure at: /workspace/docs/design/file_tree.md

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Templates table with vector embeddings (1536 dimensions)
- Generation algorithms table for "Routix Versions"
- Users table with credits system
- Generation requests table with status tracking
- Conversation/messages tables for chat history
- Admin actions audit trail

Save all database files to: /workspace/backend/app/core/ and /workspace/backend/alembic/
Create seed data script at: /workspace/backend/scripts/seed_data.py

PHASE 1 - FASTAPI APPLICATION CORE (Task 1.2): Build the FastAPI application foundation for Routix Platform.

DELIVERABLES REQUIRED:
- FastAPI application structure (as per /workspace/docs/design/file_tree.md)
- Core configuration (app/core/config.py)
- Database session management (app/core/database.py)
- JWT authentication system (app/core/security.py)
- Dependency injection (app/core/dependencies.py)
- CORS and security middleware
- Health check endpoints (/health, /health/detailed)
- API documentation (Swagger UI at /docs)

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Server starts without errors
- Can connect to database
- JWT tokens generate and validate correctly
- Swagger docs accessible

ARCHITECTURE CONTEXT:
Reference: /workspace/docs/design/system_architecture.md
Reference: /workspace/docs/design/file_tree.md
Database setup from Task 1 dependency

TECHNOLOGY STACK:
- FastAPI (Python 3.11+)
- PostgreSQL with pgvector
- JWT authentication
- Pydantic models
- SQLAlchemy ORM

Create the complete backend foundation at: /workspace/backend/

PHASE 1 - REDIS & CELERY SETUP (Task 1.3): Set up Redis and Celery for background task processing.

DELIVERABLES REQUIRED:
- Redis connection setup
- Celery application configuration (app/workers/celery_app.py)
- Task queue structure
- Celery Beat scheduler
- Flower monitoring dashboard
- Basic test tasks to verify queue works

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Redis responds to ping
- Celery workers start successfully
- Can queue and execute test task
- Flower dashboard accessible

ARCHITECTURE CONTEXT:
Reference: /workspace/docs/design/system_architecture.md
Depends on FastAPI core from Task 2

CRITICAL FOR:
- Template analysis background processing
- Thumbnail generation pipeline
- Real-time progress updates

Create files at: /workspace/backend/app/workers/

PHASE 2 - VISION AI SERVICE (Task 2.1): Integrate Gemini Vision API and OpenAI GPT-4 Vision for template analysis.

DELIVERABLES REQUIRED:
- app/services/ai_service.py with:
  * Gemini Vision API integration
  * OpenAI GPT-4 Vision fallback
  * Template analysis function (extract design DNA)
  * Error handling and retry logic
  * Response parsing and validation

TEST CASES:
- Upload sample image → Get design DNA JSON
- Gemini fails → Falls back to OpenAI successfully
- Invalid image → Returns proper error

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Can analyze image and return structured JSON
- Fallback mechanism works
- API rate limiting handled

ARCHITECTURE CONTEXT:
Reference: /workspace/docs/design/system_architecture.md
Phase 1 infrastructure is ready (database, FastAPI, Celery)

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Extract color palette, typography, composition, energy level
- Generate searchable text for embeddings
- Handle both success and failure scenarios
- Integrate with existing Celery task system

API KEYS NEEDED:
- GEMINI_API_KEY for Google Gemini Vision
- OPENAI_API_KEY for OpenAI GPT-4 Vision

Create files at: /workspace/backend/app/services/
